mapper.select: /* getListSdoExceptGeom */ SELECT A.bjcd, SUBSTR(A.bjcd, 1, 2) AS sdo_code, A.name FROM sk_sdo A, ( SELECT MIN(gid) AS gid, name FROM sk_sdo GROUP BY name ) B WHERE A.gid = B.gid ORDER BY A.name

/* getListSggBySdoExceptGeom */ SELECT B.bjcd, SUBSTR(B.bjcd, 1, 2) AS sdo_code, SUBSTR(B.bjcd, 3, 3) AS sgg_code, B.name FROM sk_sgg B, ( SELECT MIN(A.gid) AS gid, A.code AS bjcd, A.name FROM ( SELECT gid, SUBSTR(bjcd, 1, 5) as code, name FROM sk_sgg WHERE bjcd LIKE #{sdoCode} || '%' ) A GROUP BY A.code, A.name ) C WHERE B.gid = C.gid ORDER BY C.name

/* getListEmdBySdoAndSggExceptGeom */ SELECT B.bjcd, SUBSTR(B.bjcd, 1, 2) AS sdo_code, SUBSTR(B.bjcd, 3, 3) AS sgg_code, SUBSTR(B.bjcd, 6, 3) AS emd_code, B.name FROM sk_emd B, ( SELECT MIN(A.gid) AS gid, A.code AS bjcd, A.name FROM ( SELECT gid, SUBSTR(bjcd, 6, 3) as code, name FROM sk_emd WHERE bjcd LIKE #{sdoCode} || #{sggCode} ||'%' ) A GROUP BY A.code, A.name ) C WHERE B.gid = C.gid ORDER BY C.name

/* getDistrictTotalCount */ SELECT count(*) FROM ( SELECT name FROM sk_sdo WHERE name like '%' || #{searchValue} || '%' UNION ALL SELECT name FROM sk_sgg WHERE name like '%' || #{searchValue} || '%' UNION ALL SELECT name FROM sk_emd WHERE name like '%' || #{searchValue} || '%' ) A
/* getPlaceNameTotalCount */ SELECT count(*) FROM place_name WHERE name_ko LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'

/* getJibunTotalCount */ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT ON (kname_sido, kname_sgg , kname_emd, jibun_no1, jibun_no2, building_mno) kname_sido, kname_sgg , kname_emd, jibun_no1, jibun_no2, building_mno FROM jibun_search WHERE kname_sido LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%' OR kname_sgg LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%' OR kname_emd LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%' OR kname_li LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%' ) a

/* getNewAddressTotalCount */ SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT ON (kname_sido, kname_sgg , kname_emd, name_addr, name_sgg_building) kname_sido, kname_sgg , kname_emd, name_addr, name_sgg_building FROM addr_new WHERE (kname_sido|| ' '||kname_sgg||' '||name_addr) LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%' OR name_sgg_building LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%' ) a
/* getCountryPlaceNumberTotalCount */ SELECT count(*) FROM place_num WHERE spo_no_cd LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'

/* getListDistrict */ SELECT sido_cd AS id, sido_kor_nm AS name, ST_X(ST_Centroid(geom)) AS longitude, ST_Y(ST_Centroid(geom)) AS latitude, ST_AsGeoJSON(ST_Centroid(geom)) FROM adm_sido WHERE sido_kor_nm LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%' UNION ALL SELECT sgg_cd AS id, sgg_kor_nm AS name, ST_X(ST_Centroid(geom)) AS longitude, ST_Y(ST_Centroid(geom)) AS latitude, ST_AsGeoJSON(ST_Centroid(geom)) FROM adm_sgg WHERE sgg_kor_nm LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%' UNION ALL SELECT emd_cd AS id, emd_kor_nm AS name, ST_X(ST_Centroid(geom)) AS longitude, ST_Y(ST_Centroid(geom)) AS latitude, ST_AsGeoJSON(ST_Centroid(geom)) FROM adm_emd WHERE emd_kor_nm LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%' OFFSET #{offset} LIMIT #{limit}

/* getListJibun */ SELECT DISTINCT ON (kname_sido, kname_sgg , kname_emd, jibun_no1, jibun_no2, building_mno) concat_ws(' '::text, kname_sido, kname_sgg, kname_emd, kname_li, jibun_no1, jibun_no2) AS jibun_addr, ST_X(geom) as longitude, ST_Y(geom) as latitude, ST_AsGeoJSON(geom) FROM public.jibun_search WHERE kname_sido LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%' OR kname_sgg LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%' OR kname_emd LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%' OR kname_li LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%' ORDER BY kname_sido ASC, kname_sgg ASC, kname_emd ASC, jibun_no1 ASC, jibun_no2 ASC, building_mno ASC OFFSET #{offset} LIMIT #{limit}

/* getListNewAddress */ SELECT DISTINCT ON (kname_sido, kname_sgg , kname_emd, name_addr, name_sgg_building) concat_ws(' '::text, a.kname_sido, a.kname_sgg, a.name_addr, a.building_no1 || CASE WHEN a.building_no2 = 0 OR a.building_no2 IS NULL THEN ''::text ELSE '-'::text || a.building_no2 END, a.name_sgg_building, a.detail_bname) AS new_addr, ST_X(geom) as longitude, ST_Y(geom) as latitude, ST_AsGeoJSON(geom) FROM public.addr_new a WHERE (kname_sido|| ' '||kname_sgg||' '||name_addr) LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%' OR name_sgg_building LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%' ORDER BY kname_sido ASC, kname_sgg ASC, name_addr ASC, name_sgg_building ASC OFFSET #{offset} LIMIT #{limit}
